price: Onlar dedilər: “Allaha and olsun ki, Allah səni bizdən üstün etdi. Biz isə (sənə olan münasibətdə, əlbəttə,) günah etmişik”.
arabic: قَالُواْ تَٱللَّهِ لَقَدۡ ءَاثَرَكَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡنَا وَإِن كُنَّا لَخَٰطِـِٔينَ

version.title: Azerbaijani translation - Ali Khan Mosaiv
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Azerbaijani by Khan Mosaiv. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qālū tal-lahi laqad ātharaka al-lahu ʿalaynā wa-in kunnā lakhāṭiīna
